version.desc: Version of the Minecraft Bedrock Server to use

gamemode.desc: Sets the game mode for new players.

difficulty.desc: Sets the difficulty of the world.

allow-cheats.desc: If true then cheats like commands can be used.

max-players.desc: The maximum number of players that can play on the server.

online-mode.desc: Whether a player is required to be authenticated to XBox Live

white-list.desc: If true then all connected players must be listed in the separate whitelist.json file.

server-port.desc: Which IPv4 port the server should listen to.

server-portv6.desc: Which IPv6 port the server should listen to.

view-distance.desc: The maximum allowed view distance in number of chunks.

tick-distance.desc: The world will be ticked this many chunks away from any player.

player-idle-timeout.desc: After a player has idled for this many minutes they will be kicked. If set to 0 then players can idle indefinitely.

max-threads.desc: Maximum number of threads the server will try to use. If set to 0 or removed then it will use as many as possible.

default-player-permission-level.desc: Permission level for new players joining for the first time.

texturepack-required.desc: Force clients to use texture packs in the current world
